lead_paragraph: The return of the suspended wide receiver CHRIS HENRY should have been a boon for Cincinnati last week. Henry, who was sidelined by legal troubles, had averaged a touchdown every 4.46 receptions entering 2007 and was expected to draw attention from the Bengals’ other receivers while being a weapon himself.
